remarks: 'Less than or equal to' relationship between and addition and subtraction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
leidd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltadd1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
leaddsub2d $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) <_ C <-> B <_ ( C - A ) ) ) $.
